author: Staff Reporter
text:
Kurumban community of Vathalmalai here launched a black flag protest threatening poll boycott demanding that the administration grant them Scheduled Tribe community certificates.

The demand has been a long-stated call for Scheduled Tribe status for the community, which has a population of over 36,000 in different pockets of the district. The population dispersed across 173 villages of the district has been demanding that the government grant them ST status taking into consideration anthropological and historical evidence.

The community has been staging a series of protests reiterating their stand.

With the announcement of the elections, over 150 families of Vathalmalai have hoisted black flag and threatened poll boycott.
title: Residents launch black flag protest
